original: Majjhima Nikāya 29
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāsāropamasutta
analyzed: mahāsāropamasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acira pakkante devadatte

original: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā devadattam ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra si lokena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi lābha sakkāra silokavā ime pana aññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā ati

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma

original: papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: papaṭika sākhā palāsam chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ,
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma papaṭika

original: sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: sākhā palāsam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena attā anukkaseti param vambheti aham asmi lābha sakkāra silokavā ime pana aññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhāti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sākhāpalāsaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu sākhā palāsam aggahesi brahmacariyassa

original: tena ca vosānaṁ āpādi.
analyzed: tena ca vosānam āpādi

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati

original: Appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: appamattaḥ samānaḥ sīla sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi sīlavā kalyāṇa dhammo ime pana aññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpa dhammā

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ,
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma taca

original: papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: papaṭikam chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma taca papaṭika

original: chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno;
analyzed: chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi sīlavā kalyāṇa dhammo ime pana aññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpa dhammā

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu papaṭikam aggahesi brahmacariyassa

original: tena ca vosānaṁ āpādi.
analyzed: tena ca vosānam āpādi

analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ sīla sampadam ārādheti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati

original: Appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: appamattaḥ samānaḥ samādhi sampadam ārādheti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi samāhitaḥ ekagga cittaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhanta cittā ti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ tacaṁ chetvā ādāya
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum tacam chetvā ādāya

original: pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ tacaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum tacam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ

original: “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ sīla sampadam ārādheti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ samādhi sampadam ārādheti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi samāhitaḥ ekagga cittaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhanta cittā ti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tacaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu tacam aggahesi brahmacariyassa

original: tena ca vosānaṁ āpādi.
analyzed: tena ca vosānam āpādi

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kula putto saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati

original: Appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: appamattaḥ samānaḥ sīla sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ samādhi sampadam ārādheti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ ñāṇa dassanam ārādheti

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi jānaṁ passaṁ viharāmi.
analyzed: aham asmi jānam passam viharāmi

original: Ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṁ apassaṁ viharantī’ti.
analyzed: ime pana aññe bhikkhū ajānam apassam viharanti iti

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
analyzed: so tena ñāṇa dassanena majjati pamajjati pamādam āpajjati pamattaḥ samānaḥ dukkham viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram pheggum chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ na aññāsi phegguṁ na aññāsi tacaṁ na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāram na aññāsi pheggum na aññāsi tacam na aññāsi papaṭikam na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram pheggum chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādam āpajjati a pamattaḥ samānaḥ a samaya vimokkham ārādheti

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam eta bhikkhave anavakāsaḥ yam saḥ bhikkhu tāya asamaya vimuttiyā

original: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsaṁ, na sīlasampadānisaṁsaṁ, na samādhisampadānisaṁsaṁ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṁsaṁ.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave na yidam brahmacariyam na sīla sampadā anisasa na samādhi sampadā anisasa na ñāṇa dassana anisasa

original: Yā ca kho ayaṁ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
analyzed: yā ca kho bhikkhave akuppā cetas vimutti

original: etadatthamidaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ, etaṁ sāraṁ etaṁ pariyosānan”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhave brahmacariye etam sāram etam pariyosānam

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahāsāropamasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: mahāsāropama suttam niṭṭhitam navama
